title: Hard Romantica
original_name: ハードロマンチッカー
sinopse: Motsumoto Ichi, who studied earnestly to be admitted to the same high-school where his first love Tomo-chan attends, came to “Rise Apartment” to meet her after 11 years but...? Showered with the affection of Ryou*heart* School life & Living together!! It also includes an unpublished work about dance and romance “Diamond”!! (Source: Esthétique)
